A system Property Category creates the page layout for an application's properties. The system Category Properties page is not accessible until a module is created. The purpose of the module is to make an application's properties available in a single UI page and to make it easier to administer your application. Application properties are configurable application parameters to change an application's behavior. Usually only system administrators/or application administrators can read and write application properties. Using an application property instead of hard-coding values allows the application's behavior to change without having to modify the code or install new versions.

The generalized strategy for creating Application Properties is:

  1. Create a System Property Category
  2. Create properties
  3. Order properties
  4. Create a Properties module
